items.title: Sherwin-Williams Raises Dividend to 79 Cents, from 71.5 Cents
items.description: By Connor Hart Sherwin-Williams increased its dividend 10.5%, to 79 cents. The new payout, equal to $3.19 a year, represents an annual yield of about 0.9% based on Tuesday's closing price of...

items.title: Sherwin-Williams Declares Dividend of $0.79 per Common Share
items.description: CLEVELAND, Feb. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Board of Directors of The Sherwin-Williams Company today announced a regular quarterly dividend of $0.79 per common share, an increase of 10.5% over the...
